Schedule

You can download all required reading in the Study materials at the faculty website.

  1. Introduction (August 29)
  2. One Qubit is Better Than no Qubit (August 31)
  3. Two Qbits Are Better Than One (September 05)
  4. Quantum Teleportation (September 07)
  5. BB84 (September 12)
  6. Quantum Arithmetic (September 14)
  7. Amplitude Amplification (September 19)
  8. QFT (September 21)
  9. Quantum Phase Estimation (September 26)
  10. Real Data (September 28)
  11. Quantum Search (October 03)
  12. Daniel Koch and the Traveling Salesman (October 05)
  13. Shor's Algorithm (October 10)
